spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of this spaces Admin Kapp (typically admin)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Bundle Package Version

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of this spaces Admin Kapp (typically admin)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Admin Kapp Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of the Admin Kapp form that is used for managing system alerts (typically 'alerts').
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Alerts Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: The Queue kapp form which approvals should be created in (Overridden by Kapp and Form Attributes)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Approval Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of this spaces Catalog Kapp (typically catalog)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Catalog Kapp Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Form used by users to request their manager be changed.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Change Manager Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: If set to true, users won't be able to request their own accounts. Only system administrators will be able to grant them access.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Disable Self Sign Up

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: The Discussion Id related to this space
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Discussion Id

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Url of this spaces response server
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Discussion Server Url

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Form used for collecting feedback about the kinops portal.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Feedback Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Footer Bundle Path

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Header Bundle Path

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Form used by users to get help within the kinops portal.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Help Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Any users whose usernames match this regular expression, will not be shown in the Kapp.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Hidden Users Regex

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Form used by Admins to mass invite others to kinops
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Invite Others Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of libraries between bundles.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Libraries Bundle Path

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of this spaces Queue Kapp (typically queue)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Queue Kapp Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Form used for requesting an alert be displayed in the kinops portal.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Request Alert Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Number of days until service is expected to be fulfilled - Overridden by Form / Kapp Attribute
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Service Days Due

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Use a shared workflow engine (true/false)?
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Shared Workflow Engine

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Defines which workflow type should be executed for each type of action. All values should be prefixed with an action (Submitted, Created, Updated, Deleted) Workflow type options are (True, False, or a custom process name) This attribute can be overridden by a kapp or form's attribute Ex (Submitted - False | Submitted - True | Submitted - My Custom Process)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Submission Workflow

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Form used to request a new service be added to the catalog.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Suggest a Service Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Email Address of the System Administrator who should receive emails about system issues
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: System Administrator Email

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Username of user to assign tasks to if not defined in a form or kapp.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Assignee Individual

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Team to assign tasks to if not defined in a form or kapp.
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Assignee Team

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: The Queue kapp form to use when creating a task item (Overridden by Kapp and Form Attributes)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Form Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name or address and port of the task server if not 80 or 443. (ex. kinops.io)
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Server Host

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: http or https
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Server Scheme

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Slug of the space the task engine is routed
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Server Space Slug

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Url of this spaces workflow engine
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Server Url

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the source for this space in the workflow engine
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Source Name

spaceAttributeDefinitions.description: Url of the request web server that this space exists
spaceAttributeDefinitions.name: Web Server Url

datastoreFormAttributeDefinitions.description: Stores which columns are rendered within the datastore console
datastoreFormAttributeDefinitions.name: Datastore Configuration

datastoreFormAttributeDefinitions.description: If set to true / yes, this form will be hidden for the settings/datastore list view
datastoreFormAttributeDefinitions.name: Datastore Hidden

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an administrator.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Admins
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
/* 
 * Space admins are allowed access regardless of the the result of security 
 * policies.  Returning 'false' denies anyone but a space access. 
 */
false

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be authenticated.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Authenticated Users
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: identity('authenticated')

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Only users with the role Data Admin have access to this resource.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Data Admins

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Everyone is allowed access.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Everyone
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: true

teamAttributeDefinitions.description: True or False if this team should be used in Queue Kapp Assignments
teamAttributeDefinitions.name: Assignable

teamAttributeDefinitions.description: The guid of the response discussion used by this team.
teamAttributeDefinitions.name: Discussion Id

userAttributeDefinitions.description: User's Department.  Updates through a request from the user profile screen.
userAttributeDefinitions.name: Department

userAttributeDefinitions.description: User's manager.  Updates through a request from the user profile screen.
userAttributeDefinitions.name: Manager

userAttributeDefinitions.description: User's organization. Updates through a request from the user profile screen.
userAttributeDefinitions.name: Organization

userAttributeDefinitions.description: User's Site. Updates through a request from the user profile screen.
userAttributeDefinitions.name: Site

userProfileAttributeDefinitions.description: Used to configure which guided tour should be displayed
userProfileAttributeDefinitions.name: Guided Tour

userProfileAttributeDefinitions.description: Personal Filters used within the Queue Kapp.
userProfileAttributeDefinitions.name: Queue Personal Filters

formAttributeDefinitions.description: The Queue kapp form which approvals related to this form should be created in (Kapp setting is used if not set here)
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Approval Form Slug

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Options are: Team Name, Individual Name or Manager
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Approver

formAttributeDefinitions.description: The Discussion Id related to this form
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Discussion Id

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Notification Template to use when this forms submission is completed. (Defaults to Kapp setting when not set at the Form Level)
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Notification Template Name - Complete

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Notification Template to use when this forms submission is submitted. (Defaults to Kapp setting when not set at the Form Level)
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Notification Template Name - Create

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Team that owns and manages this service (Defaults to Kapp Attribute when not set here)
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Owning Team

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Number of days until service is expected to be fulfilled - Defaults to Kapp Attribute if not set here.
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Service Days Due

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Active
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Statuses - Active

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Cancelled
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Statuses - Cancelled

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Inactive
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Statuses - Inactive

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Defines which workflow type should be executed for each type of action. All values should be prefixed with an action (Submitted, Created, Updated, Deleted) Workflow types are (Standard, True, False, or a custom process name) If this attribute is set to (Submitted - Standard | is not defined) the Kapp will dictate the process Example (Submitted - False | Submitted - True | Submitted - My Custom Process)
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Submission Workflow

formAttributeDefinitions.description: User to assign tasks to when this form is submitted.
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Assignee Individual

formAttributeDefinitions.description: Team to assign tasks to when this form is submitted.
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Assignee Team

formAttributeDefinitions.description: The form to use when creating a fulfillment task for this item
formAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Form Slug

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: The form which approvals should be created in (if not defined on form or space)
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Approval Form Slug

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Options are: Team Name, Individual Name or manager. If this is set, all forms in this kapp will get approvals sent to the value set here unless specified in a form.
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Approver

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: The name of the package that this Kapp should use for display
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Bundle Package

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Description of what users do within this Kapp
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Description

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: The Discussion Id related to this kapp
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Discussion Id

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Defines which workflow type should be executed for each type of action. All values should be prefixed with an action (Created, Deleted, Updated) Workflow types are (Standard, True, False, or a custom process name) Example (Created - False | Deleted - True | Updated - My Custom Process)
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Form Workflow

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Defines whether the Kapp is configured. Value is automatically managed by the Setup Wizard. DO NOT MODIFY.
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Kapp Configuration Status

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Notification Template to use when submissions in this Kapp Completed
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Notification Template Name - Complete

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Name of the Notification Template to use when submissions in this Kapp are Submitted
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Notification Template Name - Create

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Team that owns and manages services in this kapp (overridden by form attributes)
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Owning Team

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Number of days until service is expected to be fulfilled for forms in this Kapp - This attribute is overridden if set at the form level
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Service Days Due

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Active
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Statuses - Active

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Cancelled
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Statuses - Cancelled

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Inactive
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Statuses - Inactive

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Defines which workflow type should be executed for each type of action. All values should be prefixed with an action (Submitted, Created, Updated, Deleted) Workflow types are (Standard, True, False, or a custom process name) This attribute can be overridden by a form's attribute Example (Submitted - False | Submitted - True | Submitted - My Custom Process)
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Submission Workflow

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: Team to assign tasks to if not defined in a form or space
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Assignee Team

kappAttributeDefinitions.description: The form to use when creating a task item. (If set here, all forms in this kapp, unless specified at the form level will have tasks created in the form set here)
kappAttributeDefinitions.name: Task Form Slug

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an administrator.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Admins
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
/* 
 * Space admins are allowed access regardless of the the result of security 
 * policies.  Returning 'false' denies anyone but a space access. 
 */
false

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be an assigned individual to view this submission.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Assigned Individual

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be a member of the assigned team or the assigned individual.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Assigned Team - Assigned Individual

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be a member of the assigned team, the assigned individual, or explicitly added as an observer.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Assigned Team - Assigned Individual - Observers

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be authenticated.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Authenticated Users
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: identity('authenticated')

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the contractor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Contractors

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the contractor or vendor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Contractors - Vendors

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the data admin role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Data Admins

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the employee role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Employees

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the employee or contractor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Employees - Contractors

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Everyone is allowed access.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Everyone
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule: true

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the form developer role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Form Developers

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the kapp owner or form owner.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Form Owners - Kapp Owners

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be a kapp owner.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Kapp Owners

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the submission support role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submission Support

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the user that created the submission.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submitter
securityPolicyDefinitions.rule:
(submission('anonymous') && identity('sessionToken') == submission('sessionToken'))
|| (!submission('anonymous') && identity('username') == submission('createdBy'))

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be the submitter, form owner, or explicitly added as an observer.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Submitter - Form Owners - Observers

securityPolicyDefinitions.message: Must be assigned the vendor role.
securityPolicyDefinitions.name: Vendors

forms.description: Customers use this form to submit feedback to their kinops System Administrator.
forms.name: Feedback

elements.name: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete
elements.title: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete

elements.name: Confirmation
elements.text:
Thanks!

We appreciate that you’ve taken the time to provide this feedback. This data is routed to the ${space('name')} Feedback team for review, response, and action.

forms.description: This form is used to create issues and send them to your system administrator.
forms.name: Help

elements.name: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete
elements.title: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete

forms.submissionLabelExpression: ${values('How can we help you').length > 97 ? values('How can we help you').substring(0,97)+'...' : values('How can we help you')}

forms.description: Public Facing form that allows users to sign up for a kinops account.
forms.name: kinops Account Request

pattern.message: Please enter a valid email account

elements.name: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete
elements.title: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete

elements.name: Thanks
elements.text:
Account Request Received

As soon as your kinops Adminstrator approves the request, you'll get an email and be able to set your password.

forms.description: Public Facing form that is used to confirm that a user invited to a discussion has a valid email address. This form is used as a "Verification" form and the output of the process that creates a submission in this form eventually creates a User in Kinetic Core.
forms.name: kinops Discussion Registration

pattern.message: Please enter a valid email account

elements.name: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete
elements.title: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete

elements.name: Thanks
elements.text:
Information Received

We're creating your account. You should receive a notification shortly to set your password. Once logged in, you'll see the discussion you were invited to.

forms.description: Template used for creating new forms.
forms.name: Invite Others

elements.name: Add Users Tables
elements.text:
Invite others to kinops

The form below will help you quickly invite your teammates to join kinops.

Note: You only need to provide an email address to invite someone. They can configure their profiles once they sign in. Configuring someone as a "Space Admin" will give them full admin access to the system.



Email (required) Roles Teams Space Admin

forms.description: For used by the space for resetting a kinops user's password
forms.name: kinops Reset Password

pattern.message: Usernames must be a valid email address.

elements.name: Already have a token
elements.text: I already have a reset token.

elements.name: Check Email
elements.text:
Check your Email

In a few moments you should receive an email which will allow you to reset your password.

If you don't receieve an email, contact your kinops administrator.
